channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Escape To The Country
channel.desc: People seeking to get away from city life ask the experts to help them find their perfect country home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Styled
channel.desc: Styled follows the adventures of Nicole Babb and Caffery VanHorne, best friends and design experts working together in Nicole's family-run staging and interior design business.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Tom Kerridge Sunday Lunch
channel.desc: Tom spices it up with a Mexican street food inspired Sunday lunch.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Dream Homes Revealed
channel.desc: In this week's series Dream Homes Revealed we will be exploring some homes that encapsulate what it is like to live in rural Australia. We check out a charming country home with expert Joe Snell.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Luxury Listings
channel.desc: See a serene Helderfontein home with Nordic and Eastern influences, hotel luxury in Sandton, and a yacht-inspired Cape Town penthouse - this is design at its finest.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Creative Living
channel.desc: Peter Wolfkamp guides the Graham family through the total rebuild of their 100 year old heritage villa.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Virtually Home
channel.desc: People with interior design dilemmas are offered a helping hand by some of the UKs top interior designers, alongside the use of some cutting-edge virtual reality technology.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Gardening 101 With Melanie Walker
channel.desc: We look at the role play bees in gardens and visit a beekeeper's honey room. Linda Galvad shows you how to germinate seeds.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Dream Homes Revealed
channel.desc: In this week's series Dream Homes Revealed we will be exploring some homes that encapsulate what it is like to live in rural Australia. We check out a charming country home with expert Joe Snell.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: We reveal hidden household toxins and safer alternatives, explain how weight loss injectables work, and explore the health benefits of keeping commitments to yourself.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Home Rescue
channel.desc: R?is?n and the team come to the rescue of avid upcyclers, Trudie and Dan. The family's three bed house has left everyone struggling for space, surrounded by clutter with a kitchen that's more like a workshop.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: Join our expert home and garden designer hosts Michael & Carlene Duffy, as they take a tour through some of the most awe-inspiring properties you'll ever see.

channel.title: Escape To The Chateau: DIY
channel.desc: This series will follow a number of British families / couples who have made / are in the process of making the decision to chase the French dream.

channel.desc: Welcome to Tiny Homes. Where we explore the tiny houses, boats and motors that people call home.
